issue.title: [CF 1272] Condition for ability usage?
issue.body:
I would like to track my ability usages (or instant spells) to modify a counter.  I tried to use "spell cast" but it doesn't work.

I am trying to track last used ability for my monk,  but most of my abilities won't trigger "spell cast".  Example - tiger palm,  blackout kick,  rushing jade wind.


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg | Imported from CurseForge issue #1272 | Raw

comments.body:
There's already a condition for this, called "Last Ability Used".


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That's great! Didn't think to look under that menu. Why is it not part of spells and items?

Anyway - that's exactly what I was looking for!


> Posted by CurseForge user ariehg
